headerDisplay: Homebridge platform plugin for Eco and WION Wi-Fi modules and switches. This plugin allows you to remotely control the state of your Eco Plug. It allows you to set the on/off state. This plugin supports device auto discovery, and will scan the network for new devices every 60 seconds and add new devices.

name.title: Name
name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the Homebridge log

port.title: Port
port.description: Port used for incoming communication with ecoplugs. Ensure that this port is open to incoming communications

refresh.title: Status Polling Interval
refresh.description: How long in seconds to poll devices for changes in their status. Use 0 to never poll devices' status (not recommended). Default: 10

cache_timeout.title: Discovery Interval
cache_timeout.description: How long in seconds until Homebridge searches for new devices. Use 0 to never search for new devices (not recommended). Default: 60

deviceInactiveTimout.title: Set Device to Inactive Timeout
deviceInactiveTimout.description: How long in seconds until a device is declared inactive when not responding. Use 0 for never set to inactive. Default: 30

deviceRemoveTimeout.title: Remove Device Timeout
deviceRemoveTimeout.description: How long, in seconds, a device is removed from homebridge. Use 0 to never remove a device. Default: 0
